name: HiloEnergy
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
You can manage all your devices in your Hilo home using simple voice commands. Adjust your thermostats and set the temperature of a room or the entire house, wherever you are. Change the colour of your light bulbs to match your mood and create the ambiance you want by dimming the lighting. Activate or deactivate your devices as you see fit with smart plugs. Stay on top of the weather and the air quality in your home. All this, plus have fun creating scenes to simply your life and get the most out of your Hilo home.

The use of the Hilo Energy Skill requires the possession of a Hilo Gateway and devices connected by the Hilo solution. The supported devices are:
- Sylvania A19 SMART + full color smart bulb, model 74933
- GE Lighting smart socket 45853;
- GE Lighting smart switch 45856GE;
- Stelpro SMT402AD thermostat

Once you've linked your Amazon account and your Hilo account, you'll be able to use the following phrases:

Switches and Lights
• "Alexa, turn on/turn off <name of device>"
• "Alexa, turn on/turn off <name of the room>"
• "Alexa, turn on/turn off all the lights


Lights
• "Alexa, turn on <name of the room> to 50%"
• "Alexa, decrease the brightness of <name of the room/name of the device>"
• "Alexa, set the brightness of <name of the room/name of the device> to 50%"
• "Alexa, set the color of <name of the room/name of the device> to red"

Thermostats
• "Alexa, set the temperature of <name of the room/name of the device> to 20 degrees"
• "Alexa, increase the temperature of <name of the room/name of the device> "
• "Alexa, what is <name of thermostat> set to?”
• "Alexa,what is the temperature of <name of thermostat>?"

Scenes
• "Alexa, activate <name of the scene>"

It is strongly recommended that you use room and device names in the same language as your voice assistant.

Hilo
